Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

BALTHAZAR KING, who attracted strong support only to fall at the fifth at the Cheltenham festival, can gain some compensation by winning this less competitive affair, though he will have to be on his mettle to see off a likely challenge from Thetwincamdrift.
